snippet: Apple has long promoted the simplicity of its products -- the hardware design, the software interface, the names, the packaging. But with the addition of the iPad Mini, its tablet family has become more complicated.
abstract: Apple has long promoted the simplicity of its products -- the hardware design, the software interface, the names, the packaging. But with the addition of the iPad Mini, its tablet family has become more complicated.

headline.main: Apple's iPad Lineup Gets More Complex
